alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 4:25AM MST until January 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Grand Valley. * WHEN...Until noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snowpacked road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Banded snow may create locally higher amounts across the Valley. Expect rapidly changing conditions tonight through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
